            "tag": "greeting",
            "patterns": [
                "Hello",
                "Hi",
                "Hey",
                "Good morning",
                "Good evening"
            ],
            "responses": [
                "Hello! How can I assist you today?",
                "Hi there! What can I do for you?",
                "Hey! How can I help?"
            ]
        },
        {
            "tag": "goodbye",
            "patterns": [

            ]
